help_trim_image:
HINT: This removes any end zero padding from file,
 useful if you plan to flash it using tools like
 MTKClient when sparse isn't an option for you.

dependency_missing_for_plugin_install: Cannot install '{plugin_name}'. Missing dependency: '{dependency_name}'. Please install '{dependency_name}' first.
dependency_not_in_repo_msg: Cannot install '{plugin_name}'. Required dependency '{dep_name}' not found in the repository.
dependency_installation_failed_msg: Installation of plugin '{plugin_name}' aborted because dependency '{dep_name}' failed to install.
imgdiff_info_packed_as_new_due_to_cache: Total {blocks} blocks ({bytes} bytes) are packed as new blocks due to insufficient cache size.
imgdiff_info_backward_edges_stats_v1: {out_of_order}/{total} dependencies ({percentage:.2f}%) were violated; {lost_source} source blocks removed.
imgdiff_info_reversed_edges_stats_v2plus: {out_of_order}/{total} dependencies ({percentage:.2f}%) were violated; {stashed_size} source blocks stashed.
imgdiff_info_max_stashed_limit: Max stashed blocks: {blocks} ({bytes} bytes), limit: {limit_bytes} bytes ({percentage:.2f}%)
imgdiff_error_stash_exceeds_limit: Stash size {stash_bytes} ({stash_blocks} * {block_size}) exceeds the limit {max_allowed_bytes} ({cache_size_bytes} * {threshold:.2f}). Cannot proceed.
imgdiff_error_diff_tool_failed: Diff tool '{tool}' failed for {target_name} (source: {source_name}). Exit code: {code}. Error: {error_output}
imgdiff_error_file_must_be_multiple_of_b: Data for DataImage must be multiple of {blocksize} bytes unless trim or pad is specified.
